title: Flat File All Orders Data Reports (by last update)
description: Flat File All Orders Data by Last Update Date General Reports

order-id.description: The unique identifier of the order.

order-item-id.description: The unique identifier of the order item.

purchase-date.description: The date and time of the purchase.

payments-date.description: The date and time of the payment.

reporting-date.description: The date and time when the data is reported.

promise-date.description: The promised delivery date and time.

days-past-promise.description: Number of days past the promised delivery date.

buyer-email.description: The email address of the buyer.

buyer-phone-number.description: The phone number of the buyer.

is-business-order.description: Flag indicating if the order is a business order (true/false).

quantity-purchased.description: The quantity of the product purchased.

quantity-shipped.description: The quantity of the product that has been shipped.

quantity-to-ship.description: The remaining quantity of the product to be shipped.

product-name.description: The name of the product in the order.

purchase-order-number.description: The purchase order number associated with the order.

recipient-name.description: The name of the recipient of the order.

ship-city.description: The city where the order is being shipped.

ship-country.description: The country where the order is being shipped.

ship-postal-code.description: The postal code of the shipping address.

ship-service-level.description: The service level of the shipping method.

ship-state.description: The state where the order is being shipped.

sku.description: The Stock Keeping Unit (SKU) of the product.

dataEndTime.description: The end time of the data in the specified format (date).
